ModEntry.Name: good_subsistence
ModEntry.Author: unknown
ModEntry.Description:
Good subsistence mod that allows you to select 'None' on loadout screen for primary hip and secondary weapons.
After installing the mod, develop new weapons named "---", then select them on loadout screen (at the end of the list).
Compatible with MGSV 1.10 (title screen).
Fulton can be disabled using script_loader. See https://unknown321.github.io/mgsv_research/weapons.html for more info on usage and configuration.
